Subject: !!URGENT!! PingCastle Pro license is inactive although our contract gas renewed on 02/20/2025!
Description:
!!URGENT!!

Dear Netwrix-Team,

However, our license is currently inactive for some reason. Therefore I am trying to contact Anastasia, but I can not seem to reach her. Solution_Comment__c: The license has been successfully assigned by our internal team.
